entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
